                                                :ARG2 (p2 / polite-01

                  :time (a2 / always))))

comment: Antisemitic (e.g. "ki-e") homophobic (e.g. "fa--ot") and racist (e.g. the "n word) hate speech is forbidden here. Let’s avoid it--thanks!
amr:
# ::snt Antisemitic (e.g. "ki-e") homophobic (e.g. "fa--ot") and racist (e.g. the "n word) hate speech is forbidden here. Let’s avoid it--thanks!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / avoid-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (w / we)
            :ARG1 (ii / it)
            :ARG1-of (t / thank-01
                  :mode expressive
                  :ARG0 (w2 / we)))
      :snt2 (f / forbid-01
            :ARG1 (s / speak-01
                  :ARG1 (h / hate-01)
                  :mod (o / overt)
                  :example (s2 / string-entity
                        :value "fa--ot")
                  :example (s3 / string-entity
                        :value "n"))
            :location (h2 / here)))
